com.stockticker.persistence

Interface TrackedStocksDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TrackedStocksDAOImpl

    public interface TrackedStocksDAO

    Interface that defines the Data Access methods that enables users to track stocks of interest.

    Version:
    1.0 02/27/2014
    Author:
    Stuart Connall
    See Also:
    TrackedStocksDAOImpl, PersistenceServiceException

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean add(int userId, int stockId)
      Adds a row to the tracked stocks table with userId and stockId
      boolean delete(int userId, int stockId)
      Deletes the row from the tracked stocks table associated with the userId and stockId
      boolean deleteAll(int userId)
      Deletes all tracked stocks associated with the userId
      boolean exists(int userId, int stockId)
      Checks if the row matching the userId and stockId exists in the tracked stocks table
      List<String> get(int userId)
      Retrieves all tracked stocks associated with the userId
      int getStockId(String symbol)
      Gets the stockId associated with the specified symbol

    • Method Detail

      • getStockId

        int getStockId(String symbol)
               throws PersistenceServiceException
        Gets the stockId associated with the specified symbol
        Parameters:
        symbol - the name of the stock
        Returns:
        the stock id, -1 otherwise
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - this exception typically occurs when there is something wrong with the SQL statement or a connection is not available. The latter should not occur as checks should have already been done by the time this method is invoked.

      • add

        boolean add(int userId,
          int stockId)
            throws PersistenceServiceException
        Adds a row to the tracked stocks table with userId and stockId
        Parameters:
        userId - the id associated with the user row
        stockId - the id associated with the stock row
        Returns:
        true if added, false otherwise
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - this exception typically occurs when there is something wrong with the SQL statement or a connection is not available. The latter should not occur as checks should have already been done by the time this method is invoked.

      • exists

        boolean exists(int userId,
             int stockId)
               throws PersistenceServiceException
        Checks if the row matching the userId and stockId exists in the tracked stocks table
        Parameters:
        userId - the id associated with the user row
        stockId - the id associated with the stock row
        Returns:
        true if exists, false otherwise
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - this exception typically occurs when there is something wrong with the SQL statement or a connection is not available. The latter should not occur as checks should have already been done by the time this method is invoked.

      • get

        List<String> get(int userId)
                 throws PersistenceServiceException
        Retrieves all tracked stocks associated with the userId
        Parameters:
        userId - the id associated with the user row
        Returns:
        a list of stocks or an empty list
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - this exception typically occurs when there is something wrong with the SQL statement or a connection is not available. The latter should not occur as checks should have already been done by the time this method is invoked.

      • delete

        boolean delete(int userId,
             int stockId)
               throws PersistenceServiceException
        Deletes the row from the tracked stocks table associated with the userId and stockId
        Parameters:
        userId - the id associated with the user row
        stockId - the id associated with the stock row
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - this exception typically occurs when there is something wrong with the SQL statement or a connection is not available. The latter should not occur as checks should have already been done by the time this method is invoked.

      • deleteAll

        boolean deleteAll(int userId)
                  throws PersistenceServiceException
        Deletes all tracked stocks associated with the userId
        Parameters:
        userId - the id associated with the user
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise
        Throws:
        PersistenceServiceException - this exception typically occurs when there is something wrong with the SQL statement or a connection is not available. The latter should not occur as checks should have already been done by the time this method is invoked.
